version.fix: Converted remaining refernces to the 'MIDDLE' alignment to the new 'CENTER' alignment used by the GUIManager.
version.change: The default config now sets up the IdManager with a prefix 'dev_id-' to encourage testing of string-id support.
Concerto Actions are now classes in order to allow for easier refactoring of common functionality via subclassing.
version.new: Can now add Assets as children of other Assets.

version.fix: Path declaration now works on Win32 systems with their reverse-slash directories. Thanks fcool for noticing this.
version.important: Concerto now runs on PHP5 and on Win32 systems in addition to PHP4.3 and POSIX systems.

version.change: Authentication now plays nicely with GET parameters and maintains them around during the authentication sequence.

version.new: Created an installer script for devs.
